title: Was Elizabeth Holmes’s testimony enough to save her?
itunes:title: Was Elizabeth Holmes’s testimony enough to save her?
description:
The case of Theranos founder Elizabeth Holmes may turn on her testimony. The Wall Street Journal looks at the moments that might sway jurors.

Forbes explores how Biden’s massive spending plan would change tax policy. Chalkbeat reports on how the enhanced child tax credit has done a lot for families, but says Congress may not keep it.

The recent Michigan killings are reigniting a debate over school safety. The Intercept has the story.

Ballet companies are reinventing The Nutcracker. CBS New York reports on how Brooklyn Ballet is adding in new dance styles. And BBC covers how the Scottish Ballet is making subtle changes in a bid to erase old stereotypes.
